verbs.description: Samantha Bee [V: has] apologized for calling White House senior adviser and first daughter Ivanka Trump a " feckless c * * * * " on her TBS show Thursday . " I would like to sincerely apologize to Ivanka Trump and to my viewers for using an expletive on my show to describe her last night .
